document_data.name: ''Lit with Danger''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lit with danger''''' was a magic spear that would light up an unseen foe.
document_data.Power: It was ''+1 [[shortspear]]'' that would cast ''[[faerie fire]]'' on an attacking invisible creature once per day.
document_data.Creation: Creation naturally required the spell ''faerie fire''.
document_data.Cost: It was worth around 18,000 gold pieces.
